description: Welcome to Accounting Essential’s basic income tax preparation course.You are about to embark on a challenging and rewarding task. The purpose of this course is to give you the basic tools and knowledge to be able to prepare your own tax return or even prepare returns for others.This training will introduce you to the major components of an individual income tax return allowing you to prepare and complete an accurate return. The course is broken down into 15 sections, including the introduction and bonus content.
title: Income Tax Preparation
